slide-1.title: How to Play
content: Dragon Tiger Wild comes with the latest WILD CARD bonus! Seize the chance to win up to 127x! Guess the highest card and Wild combinations for spectacular rewards! LET’S GET WILD!!!

slide-2.title: How to Play
content: The game uses 3 cards: 2 main cards (Dragon/Tiger) competing for the highest value, and 1 Wild Card to form bonus combinations.
Bet options: Main Bet (Dragon/Tiger/Tie) or Wild Bets (Dragon Pair, Tiger Pair, Dragon Wild, Tiger Wild, Super Wild).

slide-3.title: Wild Bonus
content: The Wild Card boosts winnings up to 127x through special combinations!
Bet on Wild combinations and win MULTIPLIED BONUSES!

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.paragraph-1: Dragon Tiger Wild is IDNLIVE EUROPE's latest innovation featuring the Wild Card. Experience new Dragon Tiger thrills with spectacular winning opportunities up to 127x! LET’S GET WILD!!!
introduction.paragraph-2: Predict the highest card between Dragon vs Tiger and use the Wild Card to form bonus combinations that enhance winnings.

general-rules.title: General Rules
steps: Game is hosted by a professional Dealer
At new shoe start, dealer draws 1 card to determine burned cards (max 10)
In 50-50 bets like Dragon/Tiger, you can only choose one side per round. If you bet on Dragon, you cannot bet on Tiger in the same round.
After betting time, dealer draws the Wild Card, then deals 1 card each to Dragon and Tiger
Winner determined by highest card value (King = 13 points)
If tie: 50% of Dragon/Tiger bets refunded. Tie bet only wins if both cards match

wild-bet.title: Wild Bets
wild-bet.description: As mentioned in the introduction, Dragon Tiger Wild features new gameplay elements and bonuses:
wild-bet.description-2: Wild Card determines high-payout wins with 5 Wild bet types:
wild-bet.dragon-wild: Wins if Dragon wins and matches Wild Card value
wild-bet.tiger-wild: Wins if Tiger wins and matches Wild Card value
wild-bet.super-wild: Wins if all three cards (Dragon, Tiger, Wild Card) have equal value
wild-bet.dragon-pair: Wins if Dragon and Wild Card values match (Dragon does not need to win)
wild-bet.tiger-pair: Wins if Tiger and Wild Card values match (Tiger does not need to win)
